English:
What? What?!
Was that... Was that an Eater?
Chinese:
咦……？咦、咦咦？
奇、奇怪？侵、侵食者呢……？
Korean:
……에? 에, 에에!?
어, 어라…? 이, 이터는…?
German:
Wie? Was?!
War das ... ein Verschlinger?

English: But what is this? Where are we?
Chinese: 話說回來，什麼什麼！？這是哪裡呀！？
Korean: 그보다, 뭐야뭐야!? 여기 어디야!?
German: Aber was ist jetzt? Wo sind wir hier?

English: Ah, [p]!
German: Ah, [p]!

English:
What? Another incredible Digimon has appeared!
I can't believe it! What is going on?!
Chinese:
咦！？又出現了厲害的數碼寶貝！？
真是的……到底是怎樣啦……！？
Korean:
에!? 또, 굉장해 보이는 디지몬이 나타났는데!?
잠깐, 정말… 뭐가 어떻게 된 거야…!?
German:
Wie? Noch ein unglaubliches Digimon!
Nicht zu fassen! Was ist nur los?!

English: You will... protect us?
Chinese: 他是在……保護我們嗎？
Korean: 우리들을… 지켜 주는 거야?
German: Du willst uns ... beschützen?

English: You! You dare interfere with me?!
Chinese: 你這傢伙！是打算妨礙我嗎？
Korean: 네놈…! 날 방해하려는 거냐!?
German: Du! Du wagst es, dich einzumischen?!

English:
I don't know what you are, but get out of my way!
No, crush them! Delete them, immediately!
Chinese:
雖然不知道你是誰，給我讓開……！
不，把那些傢伙打爛！馬上刪除他們！
Korean:
누군지는 모르겠지만, 거기를 비켜라…!
아니, 그 녀석들을 뭉개 버려! 당장 딜리트해 버려!
German:
Ich weiß nicht, was du sein sollst, aber geh mir
aus dem Weg! Nein, vernichte sie!
Lösche sie, sofort!

English:
Those humans have destroyed our Digital World!
They are criminals who must never be forgiven!
Chinese:
那些人類，是讓我們數碼世界崩壞的罪人！
不可饒恕！
Korean:
그 인간들은, 우리들의 디지털 월드를 붕괴시킨
용서할 수 없는 죄인이다!
German:
Diese Menschen haben unsere Digitale Welt zerstört!
Sie sind Verbrecher, denen wir nie verzeihen
können!

English:
I am like you... A Digimon who took a human
host, and who acted as one of them.
Chinese:
我和你一樣……
也是寄宿在人類的身體裡，而越來越接近人類的數碼寶貝。
Korean:
나도, 너와 마찬가지로…
인간의 육체에 깃들어 인간으로서 지내 온 디지몬이다
German:
Ich bin wie du ... ein Digimon, das sich einen
Menschen als Wirt suchte und so unter die
Menschen gemischt hat.

English: What?
Korean: 뭣이…!?
German: Was?

English:
And therefore, this I now ask you.
Do these people deserve to be purged from 
existence?
Chinese:
所以，我問我自己，
人類真的是應該被肅清的存在嗎？
Korean:
따라서, 난 물어보았다
인간은, 진정으로 숙청되어야 할 존재인가― 하고
German:
Also frage ich dich jetzt. Haben diese Menschen
es verdient, einfach ausgelöscht zu werden?

English:
Oh really? And your conclusion is that you will
stand alongside the humans?
Chinese:
哦……？你捫心自問，
最後選擇了站在人類那邊嗎？
Korean:
호오…? 물어본 결과
네놈은 그런 인간측에 서는 걸 선택한 거냐?
German:
Aha? Und du bist zu dem Schluss gekommen, dass du
für die Menschen kämpfst?

English:
That is an unfathomable error.
Your logic is utter nonsense!
Chinese:
真是荒謬的錯誤答案……
愚蠢至極的邏輯啊！
Korean:
어처구니없는 오산(에러)이다…
얼토당토않은 논리(로직)이다!
German:
Das ist ein unbegreiflicher Fehler.
Deine Logik ergibt keinen Sinn!

English:
Humans! They are filth, polluting the world of the
Digimon as they scatter foul data about them.
Chinese:
人類這種東西！只不過是散布有害資料，
把我們數碼寶貝連同世界一起污染的穢物！
Korean:
인간 따위! 악한 데이터를 흩뿌리며, 우리들 디지몬을
세계째 오염시키는 오물일 뿐이다!
German:
Menschen sind Schädlinge, welche die Welt der
Digimon mit schadhaften Daten verunreinigen.

English:
And the woman who became my flesh!
And the throngs of people she manipulated!
Chinese:
成為我肉體的女人也是！
被那女人操縱的烏合之眾也是！
Korean:
내 육체가 된 여자도!
이 여자에 의해 조종당한 어중이떠중이 군중들도!
German:
Die Frau, die mein Gefäß wurde!
Die Massen, die sie manipulierte!

English: It was all offensive! Foul! Utter foolishness!
Chinese: 全都醜陋又邪惡！愚蠢又膚淺！
Korean: 마찬가지로 추악하고 사악! 어리석고 천박했다!
German: Alles grässlich! Widerwärtig! Vollkommen töricht!

English:
Humans exist only to be purged!
The universe demands their extinction!
Chinese:
也就是說，人類是應該被肅清的存在…！！
消滅人類，正是宇宙的法則啊！！
Korean:
즉 인간은, 마땅히 숙청되어야 할 존재…!!
인간의 소멸이야말로, 우주의 섭리이다!!
German:
Menschen sind für die Auslöschung bestimmt!
Das Universum verlangt es!

English:
There are indeed times when humans commit errors,
make the wrong choices, and act foolishly...
Chinese:
確實，人類有時會犯錯，做錯選擇，
而採取愚蠢的行動……
Korean:
확실히 인간은, 때로는 잘못을 저지르고, 잘못된 선택을 하고
어리석은 행동을 한다…
German:
Menschen machen in der Tat bisweilen Fehler,
treffen Fehlentscheidungen oder sind töricht ...

English: But the same can be said of us Digimon.
Chinese: 但是我們數碼寶貝，也一樣會犯錯——
Korean: 하지만 그건, 디지몬인 우리들도 마찬가지―
German: Doch das Gleiche gilt für Digimon.

English:
And you see only one aspect of humans and Digimon.
Could it be that the other aspects are hidden
under the surface where you can't see them?
Chinese:
而且，那只是人類和數碼寶貝的一面。
你難道沒有看見另一面嗎？
Korean:
그리고, 인간과 디지몬의 일면에 불과하다
네 눈에는, 다른 면이 비춰지지 않았다는 건가?
German:
Du siehst von Menschen und Digimon jeweils nur
eine Seite. Sind ihre anderen Facetten vielleicht
nicht so leicht zu erkennen für dich?

English:
Digimon, the same as humans?!
You have been humanized! You're mad!
Chinese:
數碼寶貝和人類是一樣的……！？
你這傢伙……是和人類同化，精神錯亂了嗎？
Korean:
디지몬과 인간이, 같다고…!?
네놈… 인간과 동화해서, 미친 거냐!?
German:
Digimon vergleichbar mit Menschen?!
Du wurdest auch schon vermenschlicht!
Du bist wahnsinnig!

English: There is one thing I share with humanity...
Chinese: 不過，如果硬要舉出與人類有同感的東西……
Korean: 하지만, 구태여 인간에게 공감할 수 있는 점을 말하자면…
German: Eins habe ich mit Menschen gemein ...

English:
Their superiority complex when crushing helpless
foes! That was a particularly sweet emotion in
the woman Kishibe's data.
Chinese:
那就是踐踏弱者的「優越感」……！
在岸部那女人的感情資料中，
是格外地甘美啊……！
Korean:
무력한 자를 짓밟는「우월감」…!
키시베라는 여자의 감정이라는 데이터는
유난히 달콤했지…!
German:
Ihr Überlegenheitsgefühl, wenn sie wehrlose Feinde
vernichten! Dieses Gefühl hat mir in den Daten
dieser Frau Kishibe besonders gefallen.

English:
It bordered on the bewitching!
Gahaha, bwahaha!
Chinese:
甘美到讓我的身體快要融化……
呵哈哈哈……呵哈哈哈哈哈！！
Korean:
내 몸이 녹아 버릴 정도로…
크하하하… 후하하하하하…!!
German:
Geradezu bezaubernd!
Gahaha, muahaha!

English:
Oh, my. Such words are not up to the noble
standards of the Royal Knights.
Chinese:
哎呀……真難以想像，
這居然是無上榮耀的皇家騎士說出的話。
Korean: …이거이거, 긍지높은 로얄 나이츠의 말이라고는 생각하기 힘들군
German:
Meine Güte. Solche Worte geziemen sich nicht für
einen edlen Royal Knight.

English:
Cease your prattle! What would the likes of you
possible know of the Royal Knights?
Chinese:
少廢話！像你這種來路不明的數碼寶貝，
哪裡了解皇家騎士……！？
Korean:
닥쳐라! 네놈 같은 정체 모를 녀석이
로얄 나이츠의 뭘 안다는 거냐…!?
German:
Genug mit dem Geschwätz! Was weiß jemand wie du
schon über die Royal Knights?

English:
I know nothing.
That is why I continue asking these questions.
Chinese:
我也不知道，
所以我才要一直問你。
Korean:
나도 모른다
그렇기 때문에, 계속 묻고 있지
German:
Ich weiß gar nichts.
Deshalb stelle ich ja all diese Fragen.

English: In the end you are just like them. Unenlightened!
Chinese: 哼……也就是說，你也和人類一樣蒙昧無知……！
Korean: 흥… 요컨대 네놈도 인간과 마찬가지로, 무지몽매한 거로군…!
German:
Letztendlich bist du genau wie sie.
Ignorant!

English:
Have at you, then!
I'm ready to take out the trash!
Chinese:
快來吧！
我會把你連同那些垃圾一併清除！
Korean:
와라!
거기 있는 쓰레기들과 함께 없애 주마!
German:
Dann komm also her!
Ich werde den Unrat jetzt beseitigen!

English:
So it is a fight you seek after all.
Very well. It would seem this is the only way.
Chinese:
你還是想戰鬥啊……
好吧，看來也沒有其它方法了。
Korean:
역시 싸움을 바라는가…
좋다, 달리 방법은 없을 것 같군
German:
Du suchst also tatsächlich den Kampf.
Nun gut. Es ist wohl der einzige Weg.

English: Lend me a hand, [p]?
Chinese: [p]，可以幫我嗎？
Korean: [p], 도와 주겠나?
German: Stehst du mir bei, [p]?

English:
Or... will you simply vanish as she wishes?
Together with Nokia Shiramine and Yuuko Kamishiro?
Chinese:
還是說……你要如那傢伙所願，乖乖地消失？
白峰諾奇雅、神代悠子……和她們一起消失。
Korean:
아니면… 녀석의 바람대로, 순순히 사라지겠는가?
시라미네 노키아, 카미시로 유코… 그녀들과 함께
German:
Oder ... verschwindest du einfach, so wie sie das
will? Zusammen mit Nokia Shiramine und
Yuuko Kamishiro?

English:
Hang on... What?
What... is this all about?
Chinese:
等……咦？
這、這是……怎麼一回事？
Korean:
잠, 깐… 에?
이, 이거… 어떻게 된 거야?
German:
Einen Moment ... Wie bitte?
Was läuft hier eigentlich?

English:
You know who we are?
Who... are you?!
Chinese:
你為什麼認識我們……？
你……是誰！？
Korean:
우리들을, 알고 있어…?
너… 누구야!?
German:
Du kennst uns?
Wer ... bist du?!

English: Would it help if you drank my special blend?
Chinese: 不喝我的特製綜合咖啡，就想不起來嗎？
Korean: 내 특제 블렌드를 마셔야만, 기억해내는 건가?
German:
Würde dir ein Schluck von meiner Spezialmischung
auf die Sprünge helfen?

English:
Caviar or mayonnaise. Your choice.
Or would you prefer both? Hee hee...
Chinese:
明太子和美乃滋，要加哪一個？
還是兩個都加？呵呵……
Korean:
명란젓과 마요네즈, 어느 쪽으로 하겠나?
아니면, 역시 둘 다인가? …후후
German:
Kaviar oder Mayonnaise. Kannst du dir aussuchen.
Oder vielleicht lieber beides? Haha ...

English:
Bwuh?!
No... No flippin' way!
Chinese:
哇！？
騙、騙騙、騙、騙人……！？
Korean:
흐앗!?
거, 거거, 거, 거짓말…!?
German:
Wiewowas?!
Nein ... völlig unmöglich!

English: Kyo... Kyokyo... Kyoko?!
Chinese: 杏……杏杏、杏子姊！？！
Korean: 쿄… 쿄쿄, 쿄코 씨!?!
German: Kyo ... Kyokyo ... Kyoko?!

English:
Now then, my assistant! Take your Digivice
from Nokia Shiramine. It's time to get to work.
Chinese:
來吧，我的助手。
向白峰諾奇雅拿你的Digivice吧……工作的時間到了。
Korean:
자 내 조수여, 네 디지바이스를
시라미네 노키아에게서 받도록 …일 할 시간이다
German:
Nun denn, mein Hilfsdetektiv! Nimm Nokia Shiramine
dein Digivice ab. An die Arbeit.

English: I'm ready whenever!
Chinese: 我隨時都可以出動！
Korean: 준비됐어요!
German: Ich bin bereit!
